name: @paybyrd/card-collect
description: Paybyrd's tool to aid in the creation of credit card info collect forms

scripts.build: yarn run build:web & yarn run build:frameworks
scripts.build:frameworks: cross-env NODE_ENV=production env-cmd -e production webpack --mode production
scripts.build:web: cross-env NODE_ENV=production env-cmd -e production webpack --config webpack.config.web.js --mode production
scripts.stage: cross-env NODE_ENV=production env-cmd -e stage webpack --mode production
scripts.prepublishOnly: cross-env NODE_ENV=production env-cmd -e production webpack --mode production

author: tiago.resende@paybyrd.com
